value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">141</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">spreading the light...what were you saying... helping our</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">fellow men... 
            <choice>
              <sic>amo g</sic>
              <corr>among</corr>
            </choice> 
            <choice>
              <sic> h </sic>
              <corr>the</corr>
            </choice> heathens...</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>Edgra</sic>
              <corr>Edgar</corr>
            </choice>...Miss Hardcastle...eleanor, you tempt me....</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Dare I ask you? So gently nurtured... Think what you are</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">saying...</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Eleanor... I have thought...on my knees!</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Edgar... (extracting a ring from his pocket) My 
            <choice>
              <sic>mtother</sic>
              <corr>mother</corr>
            </choice>...</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">on her death bed... no, no....I cannot ask it... my 
            <choice>
              <sic>alck</sic>
              <corr>lack</corr>
            </choice> of</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">birth... Your father... Ten years.... xmxmxmxmxmxmxmmxmx...</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Can you bear it?</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Eleanor slipping the ring into her pocket...</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">A life time...For you...</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Enter Mrs hardcastle on a donkey.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Mrs Hardcastle. So you stole a march on us, young people.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">There was a time, Sir John ( turning to Sir 
            <choice>
              <sic>Jon</sic>
              <corr>John</corr>
            </choice> ) when I</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">was always first on to. Now--- thats where we had the picnic</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">past year--where the grass is burnt. You and I Sir John will</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>unoack</sic>
              <corr>unpack</corr>
            </choice> txmxmxmxmxxx hamper.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">She descends from her donkey.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><add hand="ms" place="inline">(</add>This is where we had the picnic last year. 
            <choice>
              <sic>ere</sic>
              <corr>[There? Here?]</corr>
            </choice> by the lake.<add hand="ms" place="ms">)</add></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">( Children, young men young ladies, some carrying</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">hampers, others 
            <choice>
              <sic>buttefly</sic>
              <corr>butterfly</corr>
            </choice> nets, some with spy c glasses</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">&c arrive. )</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">A rug is thrown on the ground and Mrs hardcastle seats 
            <choice>
              <sic>hersel</sic>
              <corr>herself</corr>
            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">upon a camp stool.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Mrs H.... Some of you gentlemen fill the kettles. Who'll</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">gather sticks? Now Alfred dont 
            <choice>
              <sic>runa bout</sic>
              <corr>run about</corr>
            </choice> chasing b</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>erfiles</sic>
              <corr>[butterflies?]</corr>
            </choice> or 
            <choice>
              <sic>youllmkae</sic>
              <corr>you'll make</corr>
            </choice> yourself sick. Remember last year...</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">I will unpack the hamper. here where the</l>

<add xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" place="margin">
            <l>"The duty"</l> <!-- look at on Big Screen -->
